speaker.whotheyare: Lauren Hodge won the 2011 Google Science Fair in the age 13-14 category.
speaker.whylisten: Lauren Hodge has been competing in science fair projects since she was 7 years old. For her latest project, she investigated the formation of carcinogens in different methods of preparing chicken -- and found a surprising result. That work won first prize in the Google Science Fair's age 13-14 category.
